member.name: IMFMediaEngineWebSupport.ConnectWebAudio
member.summary: Connects web audio to Media Engine using the specified sample rate.
member.param: The sample rate of the web audio.
The sample rate of the web audio.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineWebSupport.DisconnectWebAudio
member.summary: Disconnects web audio from the Media Engine

member.name: IMFMediaEngineWebSupport.ShouldDelayTheLoadEvent
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if the connecting to Web audio should delay the page's load event.
member.returns: True if connection to Web audio should delay the page's load event; otherwise, false.
